home.featuredProducts.idPhoto.descriptio: An intelligent ID photo creation tool that generates ID photos that meet various specifications with one click. Supports intelligent photo retouching, background replacement, automatic specification adjustment and other functions, allowing you to easily obtain professional ID photos. Applicable to multiple scenarios such as ID cards, passports, visas, etc.
home.featuredProducts.idPhoto.title: ID Photo Maker
home.featuredProducts.legalEye.descripti: The Legal Eye AI intelligent contract review platform uses advanced artificial intelligence technology to conduct comprehensive analysis of contracts.
home.featuredProducts.legalEye.title: Legal Eye
home.featuredProducts.watermark.descript: An intelligent document watermark anti-counterfeiting system that provides professional digital watermark protection for your important documents, effectively preventing documents from being stolen or tampered with. Supports a variety of document types such as ID cards and certificates to ensure document security and authenticity.
home.featuredProducts.watermark.title: Document Watermark

productDetail.customSolutionDesc: We provide professional custom development services tailored to your specific AI needs.
productDetail.defaultFAQ1Answer: We offer both free and paid versions. The free version can meet basic needs, while the paid version provides more advanced features.
productDetail.defaultFAQ2Answer: We use bank-level encryption technology to ensure your data security. All data storage and transmission are encrypted.
productDetail.defaultFeature1Desc: Utilizing the latest AI technology to provide intelligent processing and results
productDetail.defaultFeature2Desc: Optimized performance and algorithms to ensure fast and efficient task completion
productDetail.defaultFeature3Desc: Multiple encryption technologies to ensure user data security
productDetail.defaultReview1: This product is very useful, feature-rich, and has a friendly interface. Highly recommended!
productDetail.defaultReview2: I've been using it for several months. It's stable and customer service is responsive. Satisfied.
productDetail.defaultUseCase1Desc: Meet the daily needs of individual users, simple and easy to use
productDetail.defaultUseCase2Desc: Provide professional solutions for enterprises to improve work efficiency

productDetail.idPhoto.faqs.freeAnswer: Yes, all features of XiaoHua ID Photo are completely free to use.
productDetail.idPhoto.faqs.officialAnswe: Yes, our photo specifications comply with standard requirements for various official documents.
productDetail.idPhoto.faqs.officialUse: Are the photos suitable for official documents?
productDetail.idPhoto.faqs.storageAnswer: Your photos will be permanently stored in your cloud account.
productDetail.idPhoto.faqs.storageQuesti: How long will my photos be saved?
productDetail.idPhoto.reviews.review1: Completely free ID photo tool with natural AI beautification effects. Great!
productDetail.idPhoto.reviews.review2: Very convenient to use, professional photo editing, saved a lot of money.
productDetail.idPhoto.useCases.idDesc: Quickly generate standard photos for ID cards, passports, etc.
productDetail.idPhoto.useCases.studentDe: Create photos for student IDs, campus cards, etc.
productDetail.relatedProductsDesc: You might also be interested in these products
productDetail.watermark.faqs.affectAppea: Will the watermark affect the appearance of documents?
productDetail.watermark.faqs.appearanceA: No, we use invisible digital watermark technology that does not affect the visual appearance of documents.
productDetail.watermark.faqs.freeAnswer: Yes, the Document Watermark system is completely free, and all functions can be used without payment.
productDetail.watermark.faqs.verificatio: They can be verified through our provided validator by simply scanning the document.
productDetail.watermark.reviews.review1: Completely free and works so well! The watermark is completely invisible but easy to verify authenticity.
productDetail.watermark.reviews.review2: The school uses it to process student certificates. The batch processing function is very convenient, and it's completely free, saving a lot of budget.
productDetail.watermark.useCases.certifi: Add anti-counterfeiting watermarks to academic certificates and qualification certificates
productDetail.watermark.useCases.copyrig: Add copyright watermarks to digital works to protect intellectual property
productDetail.watermark.useCases.fileDes: Protect company confidential files from leakage and tampering

projects.contributeCodeDesc: Help us improve existing features or add new ones, building stronger open source projects together.
projects.contributionDesc: Open source is not just code, but a culture and belief. Whether you contribute code, submit issues, or improve documentation, we welcome your participation!
projects.contributionItems.reactNative.d: Developed a new accessibility feature component, making applications more accessible to visually impaired users.
projects.contributionItems.reactNative.i: Improved accessibility standards for React Native applications, adopted by multiple large applications.
projects.contributionItems.tensorflow.de: Contributed a new data preprocessing feature to TensorFlow, improving model training efficiency.
projects.contributionItems.tensorflow.im: The feature was merged into the main branch, affecting millions of TensorFlow users globally.
projects.contributionItems.vuejs.descrip: Fixed a critical performance issue in Vue.js, optimizing the rendering speed of large lists.
projects.contributionItems.vuejs.impact: Performance improved by approximately 30%, especially when handling large datasets.
projects.contributionsDesc: We believe in the value of the open source spirit, not only creating our own projects but also actively contributing to other open source projects.
projects.improveDocumentationDesc: Quality documentation makes projects easier to understand and use. Help us improve tutorials and API documentation.
projects.openSourceDesc: We uphold the concept of open sharing, actively participate in the open source community, and promote technological innovation and development.
projects.projectItems.aiChatPlatform.des: An intelligent dialogue platform based on large language models, supporting multi-turn conversations, context understanding, knowledge base integration, and custom training.
